title: Coast, Hurricane Island
credit_line: Gift of Mrs. James H. Beal
provenance_text:
William Austin Kienbusch [1914-1980], New York, NY and Cranberry Island, ME; Kraushaar Galleries, New York, NY, until May 1956; Mrs. James H. Beal (born Rebecca Huebley Jones) [1898-1993], Pittsburgh, PA, May 1956 until December 21, 1956 [1]; gift to Department of Fine Arts, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, December 1956 [2].

Notes:
[1]. Mrs. Beal purchased the work for $400 on February 6, 1956. Receipt of final payment from Kraushaar Galleries is dated May 17, 1956 (see copy in curatorial file.)
[2]. The work was first in storage at Carnegie Institute and then, as of October 24, 1956, on loan; it was accessioned on December 21, 1956.

creator.birth_place: New York City (New York state, United States)
